name: McCann RTS
description:
McCann RTS is a tower-defense/traditional RTS game where you have to combine resources to research and unlock powerful advantages over your opponent. If you've ever played an RTS game (such as Age of Empires), a tower defense game (like balloons tower defense), or a crafting game (like Minecraft) then you'll love this game!

This game was developed by McCann Dahl using Flutter & Flame. 

Browser Version: https://mccanndahl.github.io/mccannrts/web/
